content: Black Myth: Wukong will have you retracing the journey of Sun Wukong, and along the way you'll face an overwhelming amount of deadly Yaoguai Bosses that are as dangerous as they are formidable. This page lists all known Yaoguai Chief and Yaoguai King Bosses found in Black Myth: Wukong, including where to find secret bosses and strategies to defeat them.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Boss_List_and_Guides.md', within the main section titled 'Boss List and Guides'.
The content is as follows:
Black Myth: Wukong will have you retracing the journey of Sun Wukong, and along the way you'll face an overwhelming amount of deadly Yaoguai Bosses that are as dangerous as they are formidable. This page lists all known Yaoguai Chief and Yaoguai King Bosses found in Black Myth: Wukong, including where to find secret bosses and strategies to defeat them.
